messages.message: Hello team!! Citi is asking when EOL for version 21.4.0 is. Anyone here have any insights around that?
Hi Julia, we just defined our EOL standards with the engineering team. It will be announced fully in the next 2 weeks. For now - @Heymian How will we treat 21.4.0 under our new EOL description?
It is the April release so 1 year EOL?
Thank you very much Ozge, great to know! I will tell them 1 year unless @Heymian has any objections :slightly_smiling_face:

sry, lost track of this thread until now! Yup, I think we’re trying to rally around April being our 1 yr EOL branch. We even managed to purge our images of security vulnerabilities! a rare occurence indeed.
just for reference, more release calendar details can be found here: https://instabase.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/ENG/pages/935952396/Releases
I noticed that!! That’s an incredible feat indeed and Citi was stoked to hear it too :) thank you both!
